short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get sent a notification every 30 minutes reminding you to take a quick walk. Sitting for long periods is a factor in early death.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get sent a notification every 30 minutes reminding you to take a quick walk. Sitting for excessively long periods of time is a risk factor for early death.
